infos.name: backyard
infos.desc:
I never took you for the sort of person who would show up in a backyard, but I guess I was wrong.

 You can see a BBQ. [if there is something on the s_0]You see [a list of things on the s_0] on the BBQ.[end if][if there is nothing on the s_0]But the thing is empty, unfortunately. Oh! Why couldn't there just be stuff on it?[end if] You see a clothesline. [if there is something on the s_1]On the clothesline you can make out [a list of things on the s_1].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_1]But there isn't a thing on it. What, you think everything in TextWorld should have stuff on it?[end if] Were you looking for a patio table? Because look over there, it's a patio table. You wonder idly who left that here. [if there is something on the s_2]On the patio table you can make out [a list of things on the s_2]. I mean, just wow! Isn't TextWorld just the best?[end if][if there is nothing on the s_2]But the thing hasn't got anything on it.[end if] You hear a noise behind you and spin around, but you can't see anything other than a workbench. Why don't you take a picture of it, it'll last longer! The workbench is wooden.[if there is something on the s_3] On the workbench you make out [a list of things on the s_3].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_3] But the thing is empty, unfortunately.[end if] You can see a patio chair. The patio chair is stylish.[if there is something on the s_4] On the patio chair you make out [a list of things on the s_4].[end if][if there is nothing on the s_4] Looks like someone's already been here and taken everything off it, though.[end if]

infos.name: wet sheath dress
infos.desc: The [noun] appears to be out of place here

infos.name: patio chair
infos.desc: The [noun] is an unstable piece of junk.

infos.name: wet black polo shirt
infos.desc: The [noun] looks well matched to everything else here

infos.name: wet white polo shirt
infos.desc: The [noun] appears out of place here

metadata.goal: Look for anything that is out of place and put it away in its proper location.

objective: Welcome to TextWorld! You find yourself in a messy house. Many things are not in their usual location. Let's clean up this place. After you'll have done, this little house is going to be spick and span! Look for anything that is out of place and put it away in its proper location.
